kDesc

One of the ultimate movie villains. The T-1000, dressed in Police biker uniform, relentlessly hunted his prey. This is a full body outfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Un méchant mythique du cinéma. Le T-1000, vêtu d'un uniforme de motard de la police, traque sa proie sans relâche. Il s'agit d'un costume intégral. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Einer der ultimativen Bösewichter im Film. Der mit Polizei-Motorradbekleidung bekleidete T-1000 jagte sein Opfer erbarmungslos. Dies ist ein Ganzkörperoutfit. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Uno dei cattivi più terribili nella storia del cinema. Il T-1000, vestito da poliziotto motociclista, caccia senza sosta la sua preda. Si tratta di un completo. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

Uno de los villanos de película más malos. El T-1000, vestido con el uniforme de motorista de la policía, dio caza a su presa sin darle tregua. Es un atuendo de cuerpo entero. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

映画史上究極の悪役の一人、T-1000。バイカ―警察官に扮し、情け容赦なく獲物を狙う液体金属ターミネーターです。

 

Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]

최악의 영화 악당 중 하나인 T-1000은 경찰 유니폼을 입고 냉혹하게 먹이를 사냥합니다. 이 아이템은 전신 복장입니다. Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of StudioCanal S.A. All Rights Reserved. ©2012 StudioCanal S.A. ® All Rights Reserved. [#Legal]
